title: Gothic Violence
description: GOTHIC VIOLENCE is a fictional dark comedy by author, Mike Ma. Though is a continuation of the first work, this book stands alone. GOTHIC VIOLENCE follows a gang of jihadist surfers who use insider trading profit to disable the national power grid and capture Florida amid total panic.When asked for comment, the author told us he “prefers this book far more” and that it is a “more brutal and optimistic story”.
author: Mike Ma
